rows.label: qev041601_MSG0001
rows.name: Bad news! So bad! Very terrible! The worst![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0002
rows.name: This is biggest crisis in couriering career of Kuta![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0003
rows.name: Precious cargo of Kuta has been STOLEN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0004
rows.name:
And only clue Kuta have about perpetrator is that
it "some kind of huge thing."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0005
rows.name:
Kuta never get cargo back with only that to go on!
...Though if it actually so huge, Kuta might not be able
to do much even if he knew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0006
rows.name: Still, all of it 100 percent bad news! Crisis! Disaster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Er, friend was paying attention to woeful tale of
Kuta, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0008
rows.name:
In that case, friend is fated to help Kuta out!
Also, friend would be huge jerk to hear all that
and just leave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_JNK0010
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev041601_SEL0011
rows.name: Help Kuta search for his cargo.

rows.label: qev041601_JNK0020
rows.name: Probe

rows.label: qev041601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask for more information on the situation.

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0009
rows.name: Really? Friend will help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Such nice human! Courier Kuta has never been more
moved than right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0011
rows.name: Friend will help then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0012
rows.name: Kuta was napping when cargo was stolen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0013
rows.name: So Kuta know dismayingly little about what happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0014
rows.name:
Tip about it being something huge only came from
friendpons after the fact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0015
rows.name: Many friendpons of Kuta saw the huge thief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Kuta went around asking about it,
but details still awfully fuzzy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Though to be fair, Kuta love to talk, but only
tolerate listening. That is important disclaimer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Good first step to getting back cargo of Kuta would be
for friend to hear what friendpons of Kuta have to say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0019
rows.name:
Friend looks like good listener. Kuta is good talker.
So that is expert opinion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0020
rows.name: Good luck, friend! And many thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Whatever huge thing was, it sound like it was really,
REALLY huge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0022
rows.name:
That single most important piece of info Kuta have!
...Also only piece of info Kuta have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0023
rows.name: Does it help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Getting good info? Does it seem like friend will be able
to catch the dirty thief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0025
rows.name: Courier Kuta can't be stuck here for much longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041601_MSG0026
rows.name:
Kuta hopes friend finds the culprit soon.
Kuta eager to get back to work.[ST:wait ]
